message.content: {"id": "4974", "title": "Bug 4974: Setting classpath/output location should be one operation", "description": "When you press Ok, you get the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.", "OB": "Pressing Ok results in the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.", "EB": "The error message should instead be: 'Setting the output location and classpath separately creates an illegal state.'", "SR": "Implement a single operation that sets both the classpath and output location simultaneously to avoid creating an illegal state."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4974', 'title': 'Bug 4974Set classpath / output location should be one operation', 'description': '', 'OB': "Press OkYou get the error message:'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'The problem is that setting outputlocation and classpath are two operations.By setting the first, an illegal state is created. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
